method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Return false if speech recognition is not available

method.name: _isrecognitionavailable
method.comment: Check if Speech Recognition is available or not

method.name: _setnorecognizerbeep
method.comment: Set true if you dont want beep sound before and after speech recognition. Starting from Android 7+ this method will throw an exception if the user set the Do Not Disturb mode, unless your app has requested a special permission with NOTIFICATION_POLICY_ACCESS_SETTINGS.

method.name: _startlistening
method.comment: Start listening. LANGUAGE : Recognition language PARTIAL_RESULTS : indicate whether partial results should be returned by the recognizer as the user speaks. PREFER_OFFLINE : indicate whether to only use an offline speech recognition engine. If false then either network or offline recognition engines may be used

property.name: _norecognizerbeep
property.comment: Set true if you dont want beep sound before and after speech recognition. Starting from Android 7+ this method will throw an exception if the user set the Do Not Disturb mode, unless your app has requested a special permission with NOTIFICATION_POLICY_ACCESS_SETTINGS.
